document_data.name: Royal Docks
document_data.mainbody: The '''Royal Docks''' of [[Port Nyanzaru]] in [[Chult]] were an enclosed section of the city's [[Port Nyanzaru/Harbor Ward|Harbor Ward]] that contained docks reserved for the exclusive use of the city's [[Merchant princes (Port Nyanzaru)|merchant princes]] or their honored guests.
document_data.Description:
The Royal Docks were only used by the merchant princes or those whom they wished to impress, generally meaning foreign dignitaries, ambassadors, or other powerful merchants.

The name "Royal Docks" was derived from a time when Chult had been ruled by literal kings and queens as opposed to Merchant Princes.
document_data.Geography: The Royal Docks were located at one end of the harbor, separated from the public docks by the drydocks and [[Port Nyanzaru/Warehouse District|Warehouse District]].<ref group="note">While the map of Port Nyzanzaru provided with the ''[[Tomb of Annihilation]]'' adventure places the Royal Docks on the western end of the Harbor Ward, they are described in the text as being on the eastern end.
